Key Match Events: The Lakers faced a 22-point deficit in the first half
The Lakers clawed their way back into the game in the second half
Max Christie's forced pass to LeBron James was intercepted by Fred VanVleet
Anthony Davis buried a deep three-pointer to tie the game, but was called for an offensive foul
Post-Match Reflections: James explained that he signaled for a timeout before Christie had inbounded the ball
Davis vehemently disagreed with the referee's late whistle
The Lakers agreed that the game wasn't lost because of a turnover or a foul â€“ it was lost because they couldn't grab a rebound
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jalen Green scored 33 points with five triples
Amen Thompson recorded a career-high 16 rebounds
Others: The Lakers dropped to 20-15 and fell to fifth place in the Western Conference
The Lakers will continue their tour of Texas as they head up to Dallas to play the Mavericks on Tuesday night
